thread.title: Perfect location for travelling into central London by tube
thread.title_full: Perfect location for travelling into central London by tube - Review of Premier Inn London Hanger Lane Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jeanheaman
title: Perfect location for travelling into central London by tube
text: Ideally situated and with secure parking this Premiere Inn is an excellent overnight stop whether on a business or leisure trip. The accommodation is everything one has come to expect from a Premiere Inn: superb service, quality rooms, food and a good night's sleep guaranteed.
